Uses of Class
media.MediaOpenException

  • Packages that use MediaOpenException 
    Package Description
    controllers  
    media.xuggle  
    playlist  
    view  

    • Uses of MediaOpenException in controllers

      Methods in controllers that throw MediaOpenException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void MainController.addPlaylistEntry()
      Actions caused by the add entry button in GUI
      void MainController.loadPlaylist()
      Load playlist must be above to clear the current GUI's list and populate it from the XML file that is selected by the user, and populate all the additional GUI fields
      void MainController.reFindPlaylistEntry(int pos)
      If a playlist entry has to be refound by the user because it has a problem, we will re-validate that entry, and if it is ok, we will replace the problem entry
      void MainController.render()
      Rendering a playlist means to composite all the choices the user has made as a media file on disk.

    • Uses of MediaOpenException in media.xuggle

      Constructors in media.xuggle that throw MediaOpenException 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicVideoXuggle(String fileUNC)
      Constructor takes only a filename, if that filename is a video FFMpeg can read i.e.: has audio and/or video streams codecs that can decode we will set the stream ID's and return an open container as the music video, with its properties available to inspect

    • Uses of MediaOpenException in playlist

      Methods in playlist that throw MediaOpenException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PlaylistEntry PlaylistEntry.validatePlaylistEntry(PlaylistEntry entry)
      If we cannot source the video associated with this entry, we will call on the entry to validate itself
